documents.document: RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Stay true to yourself. Make every day count. Stay hungry.
You wear a mask for so long, you forget who you were beneath it. -V for Vendetta (2005)

"�We musn't expect happiness. When life goes well it's a sudden gift that can't last forever."" -Memoirs of Geisha (2005)"
RT @Motivated_Self: Stay true to your beliefs. Focus on your own life. Build a life based on success.
Some lessons can't be taught. They must be lived to be understood. -Elektra (2005)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I pushed negativity out of my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
If you make yourself more than just a man, if you devote yourself to an ideal, you become something else entirely. -Batman Begins (2005)
RT @TrulyInspiratio: Focus on your goals. Life is beautiful. Avoid negative energy.

Love is about finding courage inside of you that you didn't even know was there. -Little Manhattan (2005)
RT @PositivesQuote: Love every aspect of life. Always keep trying. Love your life.
The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more. -The Notebook (2004)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I stopped letting negative people from ruining my positive momentums: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
RT @Motivated_Self: Define your life from a positive perspective. Love your life with all your soul. Stay true to your dreams.
You can't change who people are without destroying who they were. -The Butterfly Effect (2004)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I finally rejected negative thinking and embraced positvity: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
If we�re always guided by other people�s thoughts, what is the point of having our own? -A Good Woman (2004)
RT @TrulyInspiratio: Focus on achieving your goals. Work for your ambitions. Be your own inspiration.
We can change things by simply believing them to be different. -Finding Neverland (2004)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I said no to all forms of negativity in my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
I shouldn�t be so upset because life goes on and I should go on with it. -The Hitchhiker's Guide to Galaxy (2005)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Focus on your own life. Stay focused on the positive. Always believe in your ability to achieve.
It takes practice and skill to live without regret. -A Good Woman (2004)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I moved past all my fears and negative emotions: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
If you're somebody who's nobody, it's no fun to be around anybody who's everybody. -Melinda and Melinda (2004)
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Avoid the negative. Believe in your life and your future. Stay focused on the beauty of life.
Life is not a succession of urgent �nows�. It's a listless trickle of �why should I's?�. -The Libertine (2004)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I destroyed all my attachments to negativity: http://t.co/J5yxZZ9I0v
I only have one life. I want it to be a happy one. -Connie and Carla (2004)
RT @BePositiveQ: Be your own hero. Love every part of yourself. Work hard for your dreams.
All we can do is learn from the past and make peace with it. -Cold Mountain (2003)
Seize the day, embrace the present, enjoy life while you�ve got the chance. -My House in Umbria (2003)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I stopped letting negative situations eat away at my positive motivation: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
The worth of a life is not determined by a single failure or a solitary success. -The Emperor's Club (2002)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I stopped letting negative people influence my attitudes towards life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
You are what you love not what loves you. -Adaptation (2002)
RT @BePositiveQ: Fight for your hopes and dreams. Never let anyone keep you down. Stay thirsty.
Sometimes you have to risk the dark in order to see the light. -Minority Report (2002)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I rejected all forms of negative thinking in my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Be resilient. Life is beautifully delightful. Have a positive perspective.
If you can find work, stay healthy, find somebody to share it with, you're the ultimate success. -Confessions of a Dangerous Mind (2002)
Don't let your past dictate who you are, but let it be part of who you will become. -My Big Fat Greek Wedding (2002)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I became much more motivated by rejecting all forms of negativity in my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
You don't throw away a whole life just because it's banged up a little. -Seabiscuit (2003)
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Avoid the negative. Ignore the negative. Embrace yourself.
Inspiration is like a baby. It does not choose a nice seemly hour to enter the world. -The Dreamers (2003)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I became happier by focusing on the positive and rejecting the negative: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Don't be afraid of death. Be afraid of the unlived life. -Tuck Everlasting (2002)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Believe in the positivity of life. Be your own inspiration. Stay motivated at all times.
You cannot find peace by avoiding life. -The Hours (2002)

Whatever you do, make it mean something to you. -Barbershop (2002)
RT @TrulyInspiratio: Avoid negative energy. Don't dwell on negative thoughts. Believe in your ability to achieve.
Love itself is what is left over when being in love has burned away. -Captain Corelli's Mandolin (2001)
There is only one freedom of any importance, freedom of the mind. -Iris (2001)

RT @PositivesQuote: Be healthy. Don't waste your life on nonsense. Life is a beautiful adventure.
We'll do it together. We're there one another, we totally honest, and no one's off the hook. -Lying to be Perfect (2010)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I became far more motivated after getting rid of the negativity in my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
You always been the one who take the broken cookie, cause you don't think you deserve the good one. -Lying to be Perfect (2010)
RT @PositivesQuote: Wake up inspired. Love every aspect of life. Love yourself.

RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Life is a beautiful thing. Stop worrying and start living. Stay positive no matter what.

Then, one day, when you least expect it, the great adventure finds you. -The Men Who Stare at Goats (2009)
RT @TrulyInspiratio: Never shy away from adversity. Life is good. Chase all of your dreams.
Perspective is what shuts out the universe. Everyone with their little perspective - it keeps the love out. -Taking Woodstock (2009)
